attributes.action: Reinstate Professor David Nutt as the Government’s chief drugs advisor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being recently "asked to resign", Professor David Nutt needs his voice to be heard. His ranking of the most harmful "drugs" finally clarified the truth and brought to light the certain problems the Government has in recognizing their priorities. This petition is not to ban alcohol, but purely to highlight it's standings amongst lesser consumables and Professor David Nutt's valiant attempts to bring this to our attention. Please attempt to find his list of drug rankings. Please investigate why he was "asked to resign". Come to your own conclusions on why Professor David Nutt should be reinstated...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
